attributes.action: speed up the knock down/rebuild of St Austell's town centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The town centre in St Austell in Cornwal was fine as it was, but we have finaly accepted the fact thats its being knocked down. But it is taking so long, in about 3 years they have knocked down about 8 shops and our cinema. The progress is soooo slow. I think they should just knock it all down in 1 week and rebuild it asap!
